events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle details provided by the claimant.
A claims agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer with next steps regarding the auto collision claim.
The customer received an acknowledgment email confirming that their vehicle accident claim was successfully received.
Request was sent to the customer asking for photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and insurance information from the other party.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report, photographs of the collision, and repair shop estimate.
Investigation team began analyzing the submitted documents and accident details to determine fault and damage assessment.
The investigation concluded that the customer’s vehicle sustained moderate damage and the other driver was at fault.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the full repair costs along with compensation for rental car expenses.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick processing of the claim.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement and terms.
Insurance payment was issued to the approved repair shop and the customer’s rental car reimbursement was processed.
The claim was closed successfully after all payments were processed and no further action was required by the customer.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived according to data retention policies for future reference.
